body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting FineStay Hotels customer support. My name is Austin Wilson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Nancy Stewart.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Nancy. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at one of your hotels and I was surprised by the lack of staff friendliness.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about your experience, Nancy. Can you please provide me with your reservation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My reservation number is five seven three four two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Nancy. Can you also confirm the check-in date for me, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I checked in on the twenty second of November.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Nancy. We will look into the matter and follow up with you soon. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Have a great day and take care! Goodbye.
